allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1 Foundation: Core infrastructure, config, models, CLI skeleton

Implemented:
- Exception hierarchy \(src/rasen/exceptions.py\)
- Logging setup \(src/rasen/logging.py\)
- Configuration system with Pydantic models \(src/rasen/config.py\)
- Domain models \(src/rasen/models.py\) - TerminationReason, SessionStatus, Subtask, etc.
- CLI skeleton with Click \(src/rasen/cli.py\) - init, run, status, logs, stop, resume, merge
- Example config file \(rasen.yml.example\)
- py.typed marker for type checking
- Updated pyproject.toml to exclude Auto-Claude, ralph-orchestrator, _bmad from linting

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run ruff format --check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes
- ✅ uv run rasen --help works
- ✅ uv run rasen --version shows 0.1.0

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2: Claude Code CLI Integration - subprocess wrapper and event parsing

Implemented:
- Claude Code CLI wrapper \(src/rasen/claude_runner.py\)
  - run_claude_session\(\) subprocess wrapper with timeout support
  - Agent configs for initializer, coder, reviewer, QA
  - Reviewer and QA marked as read-only
- Prompt template renderer \(src/rasen/prompts.py\)
  - render_prompt\(\) with {variable} substitution
  - create_agent_prompt\(\) for agent-specific prompts
- Event parser \(src/rasen/events.py\)
  - parse_events\(\) extracts <event topic="...">...</event> tags
  - has_completion_event\(\), has_blocked_event\(\) helpers
  - get_event_payload\(\) utility

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: State Management - Plan, Recovery, and Memory stores

Implemented:
- Atomic file operations \(src/rasen/stores/_atomic.py\)
  - Cross-platform file locking \(fcntl on Unix, msvcrt on Windows\)
  - atomic_write\(\) with temp file + rename pattern
- Plan Store \(src/rasen/stores/plan_store.py\)
  - Load/save ImplementationPlan with file locking
  - get_next_subtask\(\), mark_in_progress/complete/failed\(\)
  - increment_attempts\(\) with approach tracking
  - get_completion_stats\(\)
- Recovery Store \(src/rasen/stores/recovery_store.py\)
  - Attempt history tracking per subtask
  - get_failed_approaches\(\) for context injection
  - is_thrashing\(\) detection \(N consecutive failures\)
  - Good commit tracking for rollback
- Memory Store \(src/rasen/stores/memory_store.py\)
  - Markdown-based cross-session memory
  - Pattern/decision/fix categorization
  - format_for_injection\(\) with token budget
  - Search by tags/content

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes \(strict mode\)
- ✅ All stores use atomic writes and file locking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 4-5: Orchestration loop, Git ops, Validation, Prompts

Implemented:
- Prompt templates \(prompts/*.md\)
  - initializer.md, coder.md, reviewer.md, qa.md
  - Strongly-worded instructions with "UNACCEPTABLE" language
  - XML event format for backpressure validation
  
- Git operations \(src/rasen/git.py\)
  - get_current_commit\(\), count_new_commits\(\)
  - get_git_diff\(\), is_git_repo\(\)
  - has_uncommitted_changes\(\), get_last_commit_message\(\)
  
- Backpressure validation \(src/rasen/validation.py\)
  - validate_completion\(\) checks for "tests: pass, lint: pass"
  - extract_completion_summary\(\), has_quality_evidence\(\)
  
- Status tracking \(src/rasen/stores/status_store.py\)
  - StatusInfo model with real-time progress
  - Atomic status file updates for external monitoring
  
- Main orchestration loop \(src/rasen/loop.py\)
  - OrchestrationLoop class manages agent sessions
  - Stall detection \(3 no-commit sessions\)
  - Consecutive failure tracking \(max 5\)
  - Memory context injection per session
  - Failed approaches fed back to agent
  - Backpressure validation before marking complete

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes \(strict mode\)

Next: Wire up CLI commands, implement init/run

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
